scripts.dev-chrome: shadow-cljs watch chrome-devtool chrome --config-merge '{:compiler-options {:source-map-inline true}}' workspaces
scripts.build:tailwind:dev: postcss public/css/styles.css -o public/css/gen-styles.css; postcss public/css/styles.css -o shells/extension/css/gen-styles.css
scripts.build:tailwind: NODE_ENV=production postcss public/css/styles.css -o public/css/gen-styles.css; NODE_ENV=production postcss public/css/styles.css -o shells/extension/css/gen-styles.css
scripts.build:chrome: rm shells/extension/manifest.json ; rm -rf shells/extension/out ; rm -rf shells/extension/js ; shadow-cljs release chrome chrome-devtool
scripts.build: yarn build:tailwind ; yarn build:workspaces ; yarn build:chrome
scripts.build:clean: rm -rf .shadow-cljs; rm -rf node_modules; rm -rf .cpcache; rm -rf .calva; rm -rf shells/extension/js; rm -rf shells/extension/out; rm -rf public/js
